dict.string: FitBuddy needs access to your calendar to schedule your workouts and send you reminders.
FitBuddy needs full access to your calendar to create and manage your workout schedule.
FitBuddy uses your health data to track workouts, steps, heart rate, and show your fitness progress.
FitBuddy writes your workout and activity data to Health to help you track your fitness progress.
FitBuddy needs microphone access for voice commands and speech recognition features.
FitBuddy uses speech recognition to understand your voice commands for workout planning and navigation.
FitBuddy needs access to your photo library to scan food items for calorie tracking.
FitBuddy needs camera access to capture photos of your meals for nutrition tracking.
